mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspStrndDspTgt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ STRND_SN , DSP_TGT_TURN , DSP_TGT_TP_CD , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , TGT_MBR_TP_CD , TGT_MBR_ATRB_CD , GRPCO_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_STRND_DSP_TGT WHERE 1 = 1 AND STRND_SN = #{strndSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DSP_TGT_TURN = #{dspTgtTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
